properties.name: Gullfoss
properties.description: Golden Falls - Iceland's most famous waterfall plunging 32m in two tiers into a canyon

properties.name: Geysir Geothermal Area
properties.description: Original geyser that gave all others their name; Strokkur erupts every 5-10 minutes

properties.name: Jokulsarlon Glacier Lagoon
properties.description: Ethereal lagoon filled with floating icebergs calved from Vatnajokull glacier

properties.name: Diamond Beach
properties.description: Black sand beach scattered with crystal-clear ice chunks like diamonds

properties.name: Skogafoss
properties.description: Perfectly rectangular 60m waterfall, one of Iceland's largest and most photogenic

properties.name: Seljalandsfoss
properties.description: 65m waterfall famous for the path behind the curtain of water

properties.name: Thingvellir National Park
properties.description: UNESCO site where North American and Eurasian tectonic plates visibly drift apart

properties.name: Reynisfjara Black Sand Beach
properties.description: Dramatic black volcanic beach with basalt columns and towering sea stacks

properties.name: Svartifoss
properties.description: Black Falls surrounded by dramatic hexagonal basalt columns in Skaftafell

properties.name: Landmannalaugar
properties.description: Otherworldly rhyolite mountains in rainbow colors with natural hot springs

properties.name: Blue Lagoon
properties.description: Iconic milky-blue geothermal spa in a lava field near Reykjavik
